programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Gravity

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn

programme.title: Virtual Universe

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Superscopes

programme.title: The Big Bang

programme.category: Series, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction

programme.title: Part 12
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord, S01E12, The Doctor realises that if he can speed up the Vervoids life span with light, they will decay. Using vionesium, he does so, unwittingly causing genocide in the process...
programme.category: Series, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction

programme.title: Part 13
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord, S01E13, The Valeyard's true identity is revealed and the trial aborted, but the Doctor and Mel must pursue his new enemy into the Matrix itself, where nothing is quite what it seems…
programme.category: Series, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction

programme.title: Part 14
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Trial of a Time Lord, S01E14, Mel realises that the Valeyard has created a weapon within the Matrix that will destroy the Time Lords, and the Doctor is forced to rely on the Master for help...
programme.category: Series, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction

programme.title: Episode 1

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who Time and the Rani, S07E02, The Rani's impersonation of Mel backfires badly because Urak can't tell the difference, while the Doctor attempts to learn the secret of the Loyhargil.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who Time and the Rani, S07E03, The furious Rani begins to slaughter the Lakertyans, so Mel rallies the survivors, while the Doctor is readied to donate his mind to the Rani's grotesque experiment.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who Time and the Rani, S07E04, As Mel convinces the Lakertyans fight back, the Tetraps turn on the Rani and the Doctor ensures the missile is deflected away from the asteroid.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E27, In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her family's brutal murder. Initial investigators suspect a serial killer is at large, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: A is for Arson
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E23, Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Bump In The Night/Hitchhike To Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E24, A woman who takes down the license plate number of a car that had been following her helps police solve the murder of another young woman.

programme.title: A Killer's Skin / Where's Peggy? (#110)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E28, Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man. And the contents of a secret storage shed holds the grisly clues to a murder that has gone cold for more than 14 years.

programme.title: Little Girl Lost
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E01, Halloween in a small town is canceled indefinitely when a young girl is kidnapped and killed on her way home from a costume party.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E14, A serial rapist seals his own fate when he sends a taunting letter to police. And when a man is found dead in South Dakota, his head bashed in by a 50-pound rock, investigators go on a 20-year search for the killers.

programme.title: Family Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E05, Forty-one years after the crime, a woman implicates her brother and cousin in the murder of a policeman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E17, In Rhode Island, policewomen go undercover as streetwalkers to nab the man suspected of murdering three prostitutes. And a dagger-shaped letter opener is the key piece of evidence that links a priest to the grisly 1980 murder of a nun in Ohio.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E21, A North Carolina man looking to clear his conscience gives police the information they need to solve a murder. And Indiana police are baffled by the murder of an 86-year-old woman, found dead in her bedroom.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.
MST3K: Daddy-O, 19910720000000 +0000, The crew riff on the short Alphabet Antics before watching Daddy-O (1958), a film about a group of teenage beatniks

MST3K: Deathstalker, 19880101000000 +0000, A hero on a quest to gather magical stones battles an evil sorcerer and learns the benefits of a potato diet in Deathstalker and the Warriors from Hell (1988). Tom and Crow put on a Renaissance Fair for Mike and Crow reads a trashy romance novel
MST3K: Earth vs. The Spider, 19910914000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots get tips on public speaking from the short Speech: Using Your Voice and watch a spider devour a town in Earth vs the Spider (1958)

MST3K: Escape 2000, 19960302000000 +0000, A grunge punk fights an evil corporation enforcing an evacuation of the Bronx in Escape from the Bronx (1983). Mike and the Bots have "Men's Night" on the SOL and Dr. Forester tries to come up with a way to boost the show's ratings.

MST3K: Gamera, 19910608000000 +0000, A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965). The Bots create their own beauty salon and are treated to a visit from Gamera himself.

programme.title: What About Juvenile Delinquency?
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E07, A band of no-good punks beat a guy for driving too slow and steal his mechanical pencil, before arriving to pick up their missing member Jamie, the son of the man they've just beaten.

Merlin's Shop of Mystical Wonders, 19990917000000 +0000, A grandfather tells his grandson several horrifying stories involving the wizard Merlin and a stolen monkey doll in Merlin's Shop of Mystical Wonders (1996).

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos, 19910727000000 +0000, Gamera is back and this time he is up against Gaos, a bat-monster with the ability to shoot laser beams. Joel and the Bots make an arts and crafts project.
MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron, 19910907000000 +0000, It's Gamera Movie #4, including the Gamera Theme Song and a reenactment of an old favorite magic trick.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Zigra, 19911019000000 +0000, The seventh offering from Gamera: the infamous turtle faces off against an alien called Zigra determined on world domination. Joel and the Bots build a scale model of Gamera and make shoebox dioramas.

programme.title: Secrets, Lies and School Supplies
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Trace and the O'Briens attempt to put their own challenges aside.

programme.title: Pasts and Presents
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. Jess turns to her mother for help planning her cousins wedding.

Face To Face, 19900124000000 +0000, In the tradition of "The African Queen", ornery adversaries whose differences begin to crumble amidst the breathtaking beauty of the African wilderness. Stars Elizabeth Montgomery and Robert Foxworth.

Fairfield Road, 20100911000000 +0000, Noah McManus finds out his new boss in Washington is a corrupt Senator who can no longer employ him and that his girlfriend has been cheating on him. Devastated, Noah travels to a quaint Cape Cod town.

Follow the Stars Home, 20010506000000 +0000, After Dianne becomes pregnant, routine tests reveal that the child will suffer severe genetic defects. Dianne's husband decides that having a disabled child is not something he can bear and leaves. She decides to keep the baby.

Beverly Lewis' The Reckoning, 20151011000000 +0000, Shunned by the township she was raised in, a young Amish woman finds herself enjoying an affluent life in the secular world and engaged to a successful businessman. Until a long-lost love unexpectedly returns from her past.

Cedar Cove, 20130720000000 +0000, When Olivia Lockhart (Andie MacDowell) is given the opportunity for a federal judgeship, she must face the challenging decision, and while tempting, she risks losing her new romance and leaving the town and people she loves most.

In My Dreams, 20140420000000 +0000, Natalie and Nick have no luck in romance. After tossing coins into a fountain, the two then begin dreaming about each other. But, according to fountain mythology, they only have a week to turn those dreams into reality.

Like Cats & Dogs, 20170415000000 +0000, A reservation goes awry and two renters must share a house in a beach town, but this setup is not ideal because these two couldn't be more different: among other problems, one is cat person and the other is a dog person.

My Boyfriends' Dogs, 20141018000000 +0000, A young woman (Erika Christensen) with three dogs she adopted from past relationships recounts the story of how her search for true love led her to canine companionship.

programme.title: Shades Of Grey
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E18, On a mission to Tollana, O'Neill steals a weapon there and takes it back to Earth. When Hammond discovers the deception, he suspends O'Neill. But O'Neill's misconduct is only the beginning of a deep mystery that could have catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: New Ground
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E19, SG-1 journeys to a planet where their arrival ignites a war between two cultures. A spy realizes his side could win the war if SG-1 and the Stargate can be neutralized. Will O'Neill and his team make the same realization and save themselves in time?

programme.title: Maternal Instinct
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E20, Bra'tac (Tony Amendola) arrives at Stargate Command with a wild story about interplanetary warfare with Apophis (Peter Williams). Daniel deduces that the battle is over Apophis' child, and races to save the child before Apophis can find him first.

programme.title: Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E21, Daniel finds a crystal skull identical to one first discovered by his grandfather. When Daniel stares into the skull's eyes, a force makes him disappear. Now SG-1 must find his grandfather to unlock the mystery of the skull and bring Daniel home.

programme.title: Nemesis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E22, O'Neill is kidnapped by the Asgard and encounters a swarm of vicious metallic bug-like creatures on a mission to destroy Earth. O'Neill plans to blow up the ship and sacrifice himself, but can the team find another way to stop this apocalyptic plan?

programme.title: Small Victories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E01, SG-1 is called upon to help a race of gentle, highly-intelligent aliens struggling against a swarm of deadly mechanical spiders called Replicators. But the situation becomes much more complicated when a lone Replicator is discovered back on Earth.

programme.title: The Other Side
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E02, SG-1 responds to a cry for help from a doomed civilization, which promises to give Earthlings access to advanced technology in exchange for supplies that would help them defeat their enemies. But they soon discover that SG-1 may not be helping.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E15, Lorne discovers a planet with dozens of satellites in orbit. However, inhabitants on this planet are no further advanced than the renaissance and have a flag with McKay's face. The team realize a game they had found earlier might be more than a game.

programme.title: The Ark
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E16, Investigating an abandoned space station, McKay mistakenly brings one of its scientists out of stasis. The scientist explains to the team that the base was the last effort by his people to avoid the repeated culling they've endured by the Wraith.

programme.title: Sunday
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E17, With the entire city ordered to take a personal day the team does their best to unwind and enjoy their leisure time. Without warning a mysterious explosion rips through the city killing and injuring unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E18, The team searches the ocean for a mobile geothermal drilling station the ancients left dormant. Cautiously exploring the station, Teyla thinks she senses the presence of a Wraith. Weir, believing it's pressure affecting Teyla, has the team press on.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E19, After helping relocate the Taranans, the Atlantis team realizes they haven't heard from the village in a long period of time. It appears the Taranans have just abandoned their village until McKay detects life signs well beneath the surface.

programme.title: First Strike
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E20, The team is shocked when a satellite housing a stargate takes up orbit above Atlantis. When the stargate begins transmitting an energy beam, attacking the city, McKay takes a page from the Ancients and opts to sink Atlantis back into the ocean.

programme.title: Adrift
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E01, When Atlantis starts shutting down due to a damaged power system, Rodney McKay turns off all non-essential systems. But in just 28 hours, McKay realizes the city’s shields may fail completely and its inhabitants will succumb the vacuum of space.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E02, Lt. Col. Sheppard leads a daring raid to secure a ZPM that will save Atlantis. When the Replicators become aware of the incursion into their city, Sheppard’s team must keep them at bay or else abandon the mission and their hope of saving Atlantis.

programme.title: Cloverdale
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E05, While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Trial And Error
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E06, Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!

programme.title: Parental Guidance Recommended
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E020, Suspicions arise over Jack's handling of Dylan's trust fund. David is offered a deal by a music label but is pressured to fire Steve as his manager.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E021, Jack and Dylan begin a new life together, living aboard a yacht with Dylan's enormous trust fund at their disposal. On the surface, everything seems perfect, but Jack has some dangerous enemies.

programme.title: The Child is the Father to the Man
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E022, After Dylan accepts an invitation to stay at the Walsh home, he finds that old demons have returned to haunt him

programme.title: Duke's Bad Boy
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E023, Brandon's gambling spins out of control. Donna feels that David's new record label is running his music.

programme.title: Perfectly Perfect
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E024, Kelly's obsession with her weight turns dangerous. Brandon and Steve vie for the same girl's attention on a television game show.

programme.title: Senior Poll
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E025, The results of the Senior Poll are in, leading some to question whether it is exclusionary.

programme.title: She Came in Through the Bathroom Window
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E026, Senior Ditch-School day proves memorable as thieves prey upon the gang at an amusement park and then Peach Pit.

programme.title: A Night To Remember
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E027, The students of West Beverly are horrified to learn that the school board has pushed through a measure that will bar any student found drunk at the prom from graduation.

programme.title: Something in the Air
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E028, The group rallies around Donna after the school board rules that she cannot participate in graduation ceremonies because of her drunkenness at the prom.

programme.title: Commencement Part 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E029, As graduation approaches, the teens of West Beverly make their final decisions about the future while reminiscing about the past.

programme.title: So Long, Auf Wiedersehen
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E001, The gang kicks off college with a huge party. Brenda is uncertain about her decision. Andrea learns hurtful information about Gil.

programme.title: The Girl From New York City
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E002, Brandon's new girlfriend has intimacy issues and Brenda has trouble at school.

programme.title: The Little Fish
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E003, Brenda arrives back in Beverly Hills in the middle of the night and Steve's scheming ways almost backfire as the gang decides which classes to take.

programme.title: Greek To Me
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E004, It is rush week on campus. Now on the staff of the campus radio station, David and Donna man the graveyard shift.

programme.title: Radio Daze
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E005, Dylan finds Kelly with another guy. Donna is offered a daytime slot at the radio station, which causes problems with David. Andrea plans a date with her English teacher.

programme.title: Strangers in the Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E006, Kelly recommends that she and Dylan see other people. Mr. Walsh sets Brenda up on a blind date with his client's son.

Deadly Influencer, 20250528220000 +0000, A young woman commits murder to keep her classmates' social media careers under her thumb. After killing a popular friend, she turns her sights on a new girl, but the girl's mother suspects the truth and will fight to protect her daughter.
Driven Underground, 20250529000100 +0000, A single mother (Kristy Swanson) hides her family in Oregon when her daughter (Emily Tennant) becomes a key witness to a murder.

Dying to Belong, 20250529015600 +0000, When journalism major Olivia meets Riley, a shy freshman who suffers from anxiety, they become fast friends. Both girls decide to join a sorority, following in Riley's mother's footsteps. They discover there are deadly secrets within the sisterhood.
Dying to Win, 20250529040000 +0000, A gymnast gets caught in a web of lies when her mother and stepfather are found murdered in the family home.

Imperfect High, 20250529055700 +0000, Suffering from anxiety disorder, Hanna worries about fitting in at high school after moving to a new town. She soon finds herself in grave danger when she befriends two students -- a bad boy with a heart of gold, and a wealthy kid.

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E11, Leigh suspects Sasha, an attractive tourist, of murdering her husband. Betraying Leigh, Jason seduces Sasha with shocking results! Sean is shocked when he discovers the truth about his ex-wife's visit to Hawaii.

programme.title: Ex-Files
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E12, A series of fake rescue calls puts Sean, Jenna and Zack’s lives in danger. Jenna replaces Councilman McKenna, giving her the power to shut down the Training Center! JD tries to get Kekoa’s father to bless their relationship.

programme.title: The Stalker
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E13, Carrie rescues a spearfisherman who starts obsessively stalking her. Sean, Jason, and Zack save her from his deadly pursuit, but can Carrie feel safe saving strangers again? Sean is jealous of Sam dating Leigh, but Leigh has doubts about Sam.

programme.title: Father Faust
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E14, Baywatch faces two bizarre lawsuits. Kekoa’s father wants her to break up with JD and quit lifeguarding. Zack runs the new Junior Lifeguards program. A government Investigation puts Sean’s job and the future of the Training Center in jeopardy.

programme.title: Good Man in a Storm
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E15, A hurricane hits Hawaii. Sean and Jenna get trapped in a WWII bunker and must put their hatred aside and work together to escape. Zack is trapped in headquarters with a thrill-seeking reporter that puts their lives in danger to get her story.

programme.title: My Father the Hero
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E16, Jenna invests all her money with an investment banker who turns out to be a con man. Derek Hart is the kind of man JD wishes he was. But when Derek jumps off a cliff, JD and Jason dive in to save his life, in more ways than one!

programme.title: Boiling Point
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E17, Zack corrupts the headquarters’ computer system forcing everyone to work in the Dark Ages. Sean is freaked because a major donor is about to arrive in the midst of chaos. Jason saves Brit from her ex.

programme.title: The Return of Jessie
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E18, Kekoa is devastated when Jessie tells JD that he’s the father of her child. A rescued bodyboarder is paralyzed. Sean has a romantic encounter with a beautiful, woman he thinks might really be Pele, the goddess fire.

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E19, Investigating toxic dumping, Sean and Leigh end up chained inside a chamber slowly filling with toxic seawater. Can Sam get them out in time? To raise money, Jason and Zack have to hula dance in grass skirts in front of a lot of women.

programme.title: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E20, Leigh takes over at Baywatch while Sean, Jason, and Zack go to compete in a 12-mile race of natural obstacles. Jessie’s presence at the race creates turmoil. Leigh and Jenna pretend to be lesbian lovers.

programme.title: Makapu'u Lighthouse
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E21, For a rescue, Sean is awarded a free week at Hilton Hawaiian Village, which he declines. Zack pretends he’s Sean and enjoys all the freebies until Sean shows up! A pretty fashion photographer thinks Jason has top model potential.

programme.title: Rescue Me
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E22, Sean has a decision – move to Australia or stay in Hawaii. Zack sees Leigh naked, leading to complications with her fiancé Sam. Kekoa dumps JD and becomes a party girl. When Sam leaves Leigh at the altar, Sean asks Leigh to marry him instead.

programme.title: Panic at Malibu Pier
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E01, Craig rescues a woman that develops a fatal attraction to him, placing Craig's wife in mortal danger. A fishing trip goes horribly wrong when the boat explodes and Mitch and his mentor Al have to rescue its passengers, including Mitch’s son Hobie.

programme.title: In Deep
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E02, Playing hooky from summer school, Lt. Mitch Buchannon's son Hobie gets dangerously involved with reckless jet skiers.

programme.title: Heat Wave
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E03, During the hottest day of the summer, Craig has to choose between his career as a lawyer and the job he loves being a Baywatch lifeguard. The choice is made when two boys get trapped in a storm drain which is rapidly filling with water.

programme.title: The Second Wave
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E04, Eddie must come to terms with his past when he confronts a gang of "surf rats" lead by a former friend from his reform school days. Trevor begins to doubt his lifeguarding skill when his girlfriend almost drowns because of his arrogance.
